text:
We have been going to My Gym a little over a year now and it has been a fun family activity for my child and us. Creative environment along with passionate and energetic instructors!

Our child has developed and shown new skills that have come with attending My Gym.

We love it!

My Gym is a very fun and active learning environment for my young child. Their playgroup classes covers a variety of engaging activities such as gymnastics, sensory play and language and numeracy learning. I am also grateful for the nurturing and attentive teachers they have such as Teacher Yani and Teacher Aida. My child really enjoys going to My Gym! ☺️

Been sending my 4yo and 2yo children to my gym for the past 6 months. The children enjoy their weekly gym classes and have learnt to be a lot more confident moving about. Coaches often switch up the configuration of the gym equipment so there’s always something new each session.

Over the past 3 months, my child has been attending My Gym and recently began experiencing separation anxiety and stranger anxiety. Teacher Lynn has been exceptional in handling this challenging phase. She provided professional guidance to both my husband and me, while demonstrating remarkable patience in calming our child and helping my child integrate back into group activities. Teacher Lynn and Teacher Yanny expertise and understanding approach deserve a big thumbs up. We truly appreciate their dedication to making our child's experience positive and comfortable.

My son and daughter both went here for their playgroup class in 2018-2019 and 2024. I think they learn the most essential skills with MyGym at this age around social development, language development, gross and fine motor and gymnastics skills. Teachers are very good and child to teacher ratio among the best I have seen in Singapore, you are assured your child is looked after well and gets the attention for learning.
